snippet: The murderer, from Indiana, was mistakenly released Wednesday after a court appearance in Chicago because officials lost paperwork directing them to return him to Indiana.
lead_paragraph: The murderer, from Indiana, was mistakenly released Wednesday after a court appearance in Chicago because officials lost paperwork directing them to return him to Indiana.

headline.main: Convicted Murderer Is Back in Custody
headline.print_headline: Convicted Murderer Is Back in Custody
